text: Down on the Farm is a television series broadcast on CBeebies from 2015 to present. It is hosted by JB Gill and Storm Huntley. On 22 July 2018 it was announced that there will be a spin-off show called Down On The Farm Live - it will be hosted by Daniel Wilkes and Storm Huntley. JB Gill and Patsy Palmer will also appear as a guest presenters. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:BBC children's television shows Category:2015 British television series debuts Category:2010s British children's television series Category:English-language television shows
title: Down on the Farm (2015 TV series)
